remarks: Property of the equality of a lattice translation with its value. (Contributed by NM, 27-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrn2eq.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrn2eq.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrn2eq.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrn2eq.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrn2ateq $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) = P <-> ( F ` Q ) = Q ) ) $.
